original_text: Which was a figure for the time then present, in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices, that could not make him that did the service perfect, as pertaining to the conscience;
korean_text: 이 장막은 현재까지의 비유니 이에 따라 드리는 예물과 제사는 섬기는 자를 그 양심상 온전하게 할 수 없나니

sentences.original_text: Which was a figure for the time then present
in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices
that could not make him that did the service perfect
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 섬기는 자를 완전하게 만들 수 없었으니
